vclaim: An employee at a women's health center in Bronx, New York, told an undercover pro-life activist she should dispose of a baby born alive after a failed abortion.
title: Did an Abortion Clinic Employee Tell a Patient to ‘Flush’ a Baby That Survived Abortion?
subtitle: A six-year-old undercover abortion facility video re-emerged online in February 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
